talk.author: did:plc:iej7noizm747mixatt5pj6on
talk.utter:
This isn't about liberals not being left enough. 

It's about liberals co-opting transphobic and misogynistic language, and accomplishing absolutely zero by doing so.

Calling Elon 'Elonia' isn't going to change any MAGA chud's mind, its only going to hurt trans folks.

talk.author: did:plc:muc3red23s54qh7yhtdymu54
talk.utter: I’m not sure it was meant that way, and hopefully people won’t take it that way. I took it that Elon was taking the place of Melania.

talk.author: did:plc:iej7noizm747mixatt5pj6on
talk.utter:
'I'm not sure it was meant that way'

I don't want to have to wonder if the people I love think being a woman or a trans person is the punchline to an unfunny joke.

That's the kind of stuff that you want to be sure about.

talk.author: did:plc:muc3red23s54qh7yhtdymu54
talk.utter: Maybe you should ask the person who wrote it how they meant it

talk.author: did:plc:iej7noizm747mixatt5pj6on
talk.utter: Or people could be more mindful of what they say, and the implications of their words, instead of being so eager to repost the latest hot take.

talk.author: did:plc:iej7noizm747mixatt5pj6on
talk.utter: Or people could be more mindful of what they say, and the implications of their words, instead of being so eager to repost the latest hot take.

talk.author: did:plc:muc3red23s54qh7yhtdymu54
talk.utter: Ok Jen. I was not trying to be hurtful or hateful, so I’m sorry if I came across like that and I’m not going to invest any more time arguing with anyone I just didn’t interpret it the way you did.

talk.author: did:plc:iej7noizm747mixatt5pj6on
talk.utter: FWIW, I didn't think you were being hurtful or hateful.
